subject: LOADER CONSTRAINTS VIOLATED
msgSnippet: Hi ,, i have a class, and a teste class , but .. When i run the test with the gui test runner, i get a error message: java.lang.LinkageError: loader
messageBody:
Hi ,, i have a class, and a teste class , but .. When i run the test
with the gui test runner,
i get a error message:

java.lang.LinkageError: loader constraints violated when linking
org/xml/sax/ErrorHandler class at
com.cpqd.utilities.config.DocumentLoader.setBuilder
(DocumentLoader.java:146) at
com.cpqd.utilities.config.DocumentLoader.<init>
(DocumentLoader.java:107) at
com.cpqd.utilities.config.XMLConfig.load(XMLConfig.java:102) at
com.cpqd.utilities.test.config.XMLConfigTest.testLoad
(XMLConfigTest.java:157)

My class is the DocumentLoader , and this use the ErrorHandler
class...

A linkage error is very strange.

but this isn't a message error from a assert false .. no .. This
error occur in a line of my class.
And , my class have no errors, because, if I use this without the
TestCase, this function well.

Thanks !

Sorry by my english.

Romilson
